name: Kept Hidden
description:
You are a doctor working in a ominous research facility, always directed by "the management". You're about to start your night shift as the events unfold...

WASDMoveEInteractSpaceJumpCCrouchShiftSprintRReload WeaponLeft Click

This game was made for the Screamortality Scream Zone Game Jam 2021
